ModulePrefs.title: NAAP lab - Blackbody & UBV Filters Lab
ModulePrefs.author: Sten Govaerts
ModulePrefs.description: The NAAP Blackbody Curves & UBV Filters Lab demonstrates the basic properties of the blackbody curve and how temperature relates to blackbody curves. The temperature-color correlation of blackbody curves is explored through the concept of filters, which are also introduced in this module.
